section.title: xcsele.inc
section.programlisting: 00001 * ----------------------- Isomer selection index ----------------------- 00002 PARAMETER (MAXSEL=5000) 00003 CHARACTER*128 CHFSEL 00004 COMMON / XCSELE / NSELEC, IZASEL(MAXSEL), CHFSEL(MAXSEL) 00005 * 00006 * IZASEL(I) = material code to be selected from file CHFSEL(I) 00007 * CHFSEL(I) = database name 00008 * 00009 * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
